structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: County's Authority to Abate Public Nuisance.

text.section:
Sec. 19-4.7. County's Authority to Abate Public Nuisance.
Failure to comply with or appeal the terms of this Chapter shall constitute a continuing public nuisance. The Director shall then have the authority to promptly abate the public nuisance, in whole or in part, at the expense of the owner, or other responsible party.
